name: HeroMaton
description:
20 HEROES 8000 POSSIBILITIES 2 GAME MODES

- Challenge: you will have to reconstitute 5 real heroes from a limited set of parts! Will you recognize them? Or try to find which parts seem to match the best? Or just count on luck? It's up to you!

- Free play: Imagination is your only limit! Create thousands of unique heroes and find the ugliest ones! You may also search for the prettiest ones. I won't stop you!

FOR THE CURIOUS ONES

Hi! I'm Fred, and I love games! Video games, board games, card games, ... making them, playing them, talking about them. Games! GAMES! GAAAMES!

Hu, sorry... I got carried away by my enthusiasm.

Anyway, if you want to support me, you can consider to:

- share your best creations with your friends, your granny or on Twitter's hashtags #heromaton!

- follow me on Twitter for news and exclusive illustrations!

- or buy my first game Subterraneus already released on Steam!

It's an adventure game about a young man named Clodomir. He was recycled by accident and fell deep underground! He will wake up in a mysterious world full of garbage, luminescent mushrooms and glowing cristals. Help him get back to the surface before the great finale of the famous snail race begins!

MANY THANKS!
